item.title: How do you make mods/admins in your private server?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

You need to have logged in and created an account. The account then gets stored in the Character file.

item.title: How do you make mods/admins in your private server?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Go into you’re source file. Be it Testscape, Pimpscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the person you wan’t to make an administrator/moderator and change the player rights to one of the following :

1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner

Read full topic
